name: HiveMind (jph wacheski / iterationGAMES)
description:
Some sort of a mash-up of the old arcade classics Asteroids, Star Castle, and Rip Off. Although in Hive Mind you will face terrifying colorful Bubbles, wriggling Fishies, and dangerous Jelly-Squids!

This was created in 2004 and is a retro release, for nostalgic reasons. It plays in 4:3 ratio, although it runs/plays fine on a 16:9 display as well. (Pillarboxed)

Thanks for the support ;)

video; https://youtu.be/BbGqTbmO-1U
